Row.Text: Town's[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is converted to[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold.
Town's[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is converted to[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture.
Town's[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is converted to[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Town's[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is converted to[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness.
Upon completion, this Town converts into a City.
Increases Town's Growth by 50%. All of the Town's[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production is converted into[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold.
All of the Town's[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production is converted into[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. All of the Town's[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food is sent to Connected Cities.
While this Project is active, this City generates additional [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE]Science equal to 25% of its[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production each turn.[n]You can cancel this Project at any time.
While this Project is active, this City generates additional [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture equal to 25% of its[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production each turn.[n]You can cancel this Project at any time.
+5 Healing to Units and +25 Health to Walls in this Town. Can Purchase additional Fortifications in this Town.
+100%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards Building Maintenance in this Town. Can Purchase additional Buildings in this Town.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per Age on Rural tiles in this Town that have at least 1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +50% tile yields from Natural Wonders.
